org.apache.catalina.comet.CometEvent

  • 使用CometEvent的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.comet  
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.filters  
    org.apache.catalina.valves
    This package contains a variety of small Valve implementations that do not warrant being packaged separately.

    • org.apache.catalina中CometEvent的使用

      参数类型为CometEvent的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Valve.event(Request request, Response response, CometEvent event)
      Process a Comet event.

    • org.apache.catalina.comet中CometEvent的使用

      参数类型为CometEvent的org.apache.catalina.comet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CometFilterChain.doFilterEvent(CometEvent event)
      Causes the next filter in the chain to be invoked, or if the calling filter is the last filter in the chain, causes the resource at the end of the chain to be invoked.
      void CometFilter.doFilterEvent(CometEvent event, CometFilterChain chain)
      The doFilterEvent method of the CometFilter is called by the container each time a request/response pair is passed through the chain due to a client event for a resource at the end of the chain.
      void CometProcessor.event(CometEvent event)
      Process the given Comet event.

    • org.apache.catalina.filters中CometEvent的使用

      参数类型为CometEvent的org.apache.catalina.filters中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void RemoteHostFilter.doFilterEvent(CometEvent event, CometFilterChain chain)
      Extract the desired request property, and pass it (along with the comet event and filter chain) to the protected process() method to perform the actual filtering.
      void RemoteAddrFilter.doFilterEvent(CometEvent event, CometFilterChain chain)
      Extract the desired request property, and pass it (along with the comet event and filter chain) to the protected process() method to perform the actual filtering.
      void FailedRequestFilter.doFilterEvent(CometEvent event, CometFilterChain chain) 
      protected void RequestFilter.processCometEvent(java.lang.String property, CometEvent event, CometFilterChain chain)
      Perform the filtering that has been configured for this Filter, matching against the specified request property.
